contact.contactMessage: If you have any questions, you can contact the author using one of the following options
donate.commandMessage: Support this project. Run /donate command for details
donate.description: This bot is a non-commercial project. Nevertheless, it requires resources to keep converting voice into text. I would love to ask you to support the project and donate some money so I can pay for the infrastructure, thus keep making the bot available 24/7. Contact me (the author) if you have any donations-related questions. All donations are non-refundable. You will not get any extra bonuses by donating me some money, but you will take part in having the bot up all day long. Thank you for supporting the project! We use Stripe, the world-leading payments provider to make sure the donation process is safe and secure
donate.payment.description:
AudioMessBot telegram bot donation. Non-refundable. Appreciate your support! 

 We use Stripe as our payment provider, all transactions are safe and secure
donate.payment.form.description: I invite you to make a small one-time donation to support my project. We use Stripe as our payment provider, all transactions are safe and secure
donate.payment.form.descriptionStars: I invite you to make a small one-time donation to support my project. Support the bot with Stars - the internal Telegram currency for the fast and safe ont-click transactions
donate.payment.form.label: One-time donation
donate.payment.form.title: one-time donation for AudioMessBot
language.changeLanguage.error: Failed to update the language. Please try again later 😔
recognition.voice.empty: I could not find any text in the message 🤔
recognition.voice.notSupported: The audio file format is not supported at the moment 🌚
recognition.voice.supportedFormats.descr: Typically, most messengers record voice in one of these formats. Contact the author if you experience any problems
recognition.voice.tooLong: I do not support messages longer than {{duration}} at the moment 🌚
start.changeLanguage: Do not forget to select the language you want to recognise by typing the /lang command
start.groupSupport:
You can add me to a group so I will convert voice messages from all the participants! 

Even better, I can recognise video notes (Telegram video circles) as well 🎉
start.welcomeMessage: 👋🏽 Hey there! Send me a voice message and I will show what they are talking about in plain text
telegram.messages.voiceNotFound: No voice track found in the message 🌚
